attributes.action: make adoption a more open process with an official body monitering social services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have been adopted and given up a child for adoption, i have found social services to be unreliable, secretive and generally unhelpful. i wanted to go to a private agency direct but u have to go through Social Services. there is no independent body to monitor them. I also feel birth parents should get a say in where there children go instead of social services disregarding your wishes.People should be able to go a private agency if they want or social services should be monitered by an independent body.
